title: PAYDAY - The Heist  v1.21.0
description:
PAYDAY - The Heist  v1.21.0
==================

If you want to play in cracked steam and/or will updating in future (with TINcft):
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Copy folders "depotcache" and "steamapps" to your steam directory.
- For change the language (other than english), go to folder "_PAYDAY The Heist " and copy it's content to steam dir (overwrite existing files).

BTW:
- NEVER try to update in steam, when you don't own this game. That could destroy your game installation. So be sure, you set already the option "Do not automatically update this game" in game's properties. Also be careful when you verfify cache or change language, otherwise it could take the same negative effect.
- If you use GreenLuma, then set option "ForceLaunchApp = 1" in file "GreenLuma.ini". That avoid steam to try updating (instead starting game), in case the game would be outdated.
- Also be sure, you set "Subscriptions = 1" and "ProtectionInfoBoxes = 0" in "GreenLuma.ini" (otherwise you get errors).


If you want to play as standalone (with crack) and won't updating (per TINcft):
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Just copy only the game folder (in "steamappscommon") to somewhere.
- And of course, also copy the one in language folder.


INFO - Included depot files (.manifest):
